nodes.text: The Secret Jedi: The Adventures of Kanan Jarrus: Rebel Leader

The Secret Jedi: The Adventures of Kanan Jarrus: Rebel Leader is a children's book in the Star Wars Rebels series that focused on Jedi character Kanan Jarrus. It was released on February 3, 2015. It adapts the episodes Star Wars Rebels: Spark of Rebellion and Rise of the Old Masters.
Purchase of the title grants access to a secret Jedi website.
